title: Laboratories of Autocracy
description: Melissa, Kate, and Leah get to spend an entire show on one of their favorite topics -- Sam Alito. This time with an assist from Justice Alito’s nemesis, Adam Serwer.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
